page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: This block is very much rural in aspect and traditional employment was previously associated with farming and coal mining. Through mechanization job opportunities in the former have de_ creased whilst mining has all but van_ ished. The majority in work now travel to the nearby towns of Spennymoor and B.Auckland. Even here opportunities are limited. For the young this seems especially true. The following data on unemployment was given by the REGIONAL MANPOWER INTELLIGENCE UNIT, Newcstle _ on_Tyne (Tel. 0632 326181).
